string-array.name: kyc_ocr_user_added_image_teaching_paragraphs
string-array.item: Place your photo ID on a flat surface with good lighting. Align all 4 with the frame and it should capture your info automatically.
If it doesnâ€™t, take a picture by tapping the camera button.

string-array.name: user_added_image_teaching_paragraphs
string-array.item: Place your card on a flat surface with good contrast and bright lighting. Line up all four sides of the card with the outline.
If your card is not automatically detected, you may need to take a photo manually.
